::Battera::

She couldn't understand this bot.  She was puzzled by his behavior towards 
her.  She knew she needed repairs to her wing, but was afriad of making any 
further mistakes.
"My name is Battera.  Now go away."
She started to sob quietly and didn't want him to see her in this state of 
vulnarability.  She covered her face with her wings.
"Go away.  You don't want to be with this dishonored bot."

--------Original Message----------
From:   <Dachande85@a...>
Date: Wed Jun 28, 2000 2:23pm
Subject: Neo Beast Wars

::CyberShark::

    "I have no reason to believe you are a coward. I was simply offering you
a chance to be repaired. If you keep flying the wing may be more damaged and
you may never fly again. I simply wish to help." CyberShark said as he was
settling to the tree tops. The bat had disappeared from his view, she was
running from something but he didn't know what.
    "My name is CyberShark. What is yours?"
